is used to stop the evaluation of the program. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["test", <opecodes_then>, <opecodes_else>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>'()</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[constant 7
[test
   [constant 8
      [halt]]
   [constant 9
      [halt]]]]</code></pre>
